Address.value: 1165 EASTLAKE AVENUE EAST SUITE 200, SEATTLE, Washington, 98102, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Adaptive Biotechnologies Corp is a commercial-stage company advancing the field of immune-driven medicine by harnessing the inherent biology of the adaptive immune system to transform the diagnosis and treatment of disease. Its clinical diagnostic product, clonoSEQ, is test authorized by the FDA for the detection and monitoring of minimal residual disease in patients with select blood cancers.
